https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7VXa2KwIG7TBWPodzB9XJobs10X.jpg Based on the spaghetti westerns of the 70's and Film Noir of the 50's but set in today's times, Virgil is a gun for hire for the mysterious Boss. He visits The Man to collect information for The Boss that only 3 men have. The first 2 are dead. A Few Tales of Hard Times: Chapter 4 - The Name
